channel.title: Paroxyzm - World Unknown EP (ft. 2 new tracks)
channel.description:
It's the new year, which means new music! I present to you my first EP, **World Unknown**! https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/sets/world-unknown-ep
![world unknown ep copy|500x500](upload://mVuRnL7dLAULSIJGOLyy1S3NFHN.jpeg) This EP consists of 6 tracks, 4 of which you've already heard before...:
xyz - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/xyz cascade - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/cascade sea dweller - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/sea-dweller making noise - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/making-noise
...and the remaining 2 are *new* tracks which are being released with the EP!:
isolation - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/isolation witch doctor - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/witch-doctor
I had fun making this EP and I hope you enjoy it! Feedback is always appreciated of course and here's to a great 2020!
[spoiler]One interesting thing to look out for, if you look at each song's cover in the order they show up in the EP, you can see that they follow a story. (: [/spoiler]

item.title: Paroxyzm - World Unknown EP (ft. 2 new tracks)
item.dc:creator: paroxyzm
item.description:
It’s the new year, which means new music!
I present to you my first EP, World Unknown!
https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/sets/world-unknown-ep


This EP consists of 6 tracks, 4 of which you’ve already heard before…:

xyz - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/xyz
cascade - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/cascade
sea dweller - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/sea-dweller
making noise - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/making-noise

…and the remaining 2 are new tracks which are being released with the EP!:

isolation - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/isolation
witch doctor - https://soundcloud.com/paroxyzm-music/witch-doctor

I had fun making this EP and I hope you enjoy it!
Feedback is always appreciated of course and here’s to a great 2020!
